content.id:
SMA Negeri 2 Pangkalan Bun didirikan pada tahun 1985 berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Republik Indonesia. Sekolah ini merupakan SMA kedua yang berdiri di Kota Pangkalan Bun, Kabupaten Kotawaringin Barat, Kalimantan Tengah.

Periode Awal (1985-1995)

Pada awal berdirinya, sekolah ini hanya memiliki 6 ruang kelas dengan jumlah siswa sekitar 180 orang. Fasilitas masih sangat terbatas, namun semangat untuk memajukan pendidikan di daerah ini sangat tinggi.

Periode Pengembangan (1995-2010)

Seiring berjalannya waktu, SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun terus berkembang. Penambahan fasilitas seperti laboratorium IPA, laboratorium komputer, dan perpustakaan dilakukan secara bertahap. Jumlah siswa pun meningkat signifikan.

Era Modern (2010-Sekarang)

Saat ini, SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun telah menjadi salah satu SMA unggulan di Kabupaten Kotawaringin Barat. Dengan akreditasi A, sekolah ini terus berinovasi dalam pembelajaran dan menghasilkan lulusan-lulusan berkualitas yang tersebar di berbagai perguruan tinggi ternama di Indonesia.
content.en:
SMA Negeri 2 Pangkalan Bun was established in 1985 based on the Decree of the Minister of Education and Culture of the Republic of Indonesia. This school is the second high school established in Pangkalan Bun City, Kotawaringin Barat Regency, Central Kalimantan.

Early Period (1985-1995)

At the beginning of its establishment, this school only had 6 classrooms with approximately 180 students. Facilities were still very limited, but the spirit to advance education in this area was very high.

Development Period (1995-2010)

Over time, SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun continued to develop. Additional facilities such as science laboratories, computer laboratories, and libraries were added gradually. The number of students also increased significantly.

Modern Era (2010-Present)

Currently, SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun has become one of the leading high schools in Kotawaringin Barat Regency. With A accreditation, this school continues to innovate in learning and produces quality graduates spread across various leading universities in Indonesia.

SMA Negeri 2 Pangkalan Bun terletak di lokasi strategis di pusat Kota Pangkalan Bun dengan luas area sekitar 2,5 hektar. Sekolah ini memiliki lingkungan yang asri dan hijau, mendukung program Adiwiyata yang telah dijalankan.

Lokasi dan Aksesibilitas

Sekolah mudah dijangkau dengan berbagai moda transportasi dan berada tidak jauh dari pusat kota. Lingkungan sekitar sekolah cukup kondusif untuk kegiatan belajar mengajar.

Kondisi Bangunan

Seluruh bangunan dalam kondisi baik dan terawat. Renovasi dan pemeliharaan dilakukan secara berkala untuk memastikan kenyamanan dan keamanan seluruh warga sekolah.
content.en:
SMA Negeri 2 Pangkalan Bun is located in a strategic location in the center of Pangkalan Bun City with an area of approximately 2.5 hectares. The school has a beautiful and green environment, supporting the Adiwiyata program that has been implemented.

Location and Accessibility

The school is easily accessible by various modes of transportation and is not far from the city center. The environment around the school is quite conducive for teaching and learning activities.

Building Condition

All buildings are in good and well-maintained condition. Renovation and maintenance are carried out regularly to ensure the comfort and safety of all school members.

Program Unggulan

  • Bank Sampah Sekolah

  • Kantin Bebas Plastik
content.en:
SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun has successfully received the National Adiwiyata School award as a form of commitment to protecting and preserving the environment.

Featured Programs

  • School Waste Bank
  • Medicinal Plant Garden
  • Greenhouse and School Garden
  • Energy Saving Program
  • Plastic-Free Canteen
